content: अच्युत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. त. स्वरूपसामर्थ्यात् न च्युतः च्यवते वा-कालसामान्ये कर्तरिक्त] {@--1@} Not fallen, firm, fixed; not giving way, solid; गरुडमूर्तिरिव अच्युतस्थितिरमणीया <ls>K. 52</ls> (अच्युत meaning ‘Vishṇu’ and ‘firm’, ‘fixed’); °क्षित् having solid ground. {@--2@} Imperishable, permanent; °रुष् inveterate enmity. {@--3@} [न च्योतति क्षरति; च्युत्-क. न. त.] Not melting away or perishing, not leaking or dripping. --तः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu; of the Almighty being; यस्मान्न च्युतपूर्वोहमच्युतस्तेन कर्मणा <ls>Bhāg.</ls> गच्छाम्यच्युतदर्शनेन <ls>K. P. 5.</ls> (where अ° also means ‘one who is firm, does not yield to passions’). {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a plant, Morinda Tinctoria. {@--3@} A sort of poetical composition containing 12 cantos.
